extends Bonus

    • Method Detail

      • stepBonus

        public boolean stepBonus()
        Description copied from class: Bonus
        Step the bonus, no effect if activateBonus was not activated. Note: The bonus effect will end after the duration of the bonus.
        Specified by:
        stepBonus in class Bonus
        Returns:
        false is the bonus MUST BE DELETED. Because its effect has finished. true otherwise.
